text: Like many sites, we use "cookies" to collect information.
Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you use Products ("Log Data").

We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information.
We will retain your Personal Data for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
While using our Products, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information (Personal Data) that can be used to contact or identify you.
